QuestData.Title: To New Thalanaar
QuestData.Description: We are staging a relief effort at New Thalanaar for all of Thousand Needles. Seyala Nightwisp will lend you my hippogryph to safely get you there. Speak with Caryssia Moonhunter when you land.$B$BYou must go quickly if lives are to be saved!
QuestData.LogDescription: Borrow a hippogryph from Seyala Nightwisp and speak with Caryssia Moonhunter at New Thalanaar in Feralas.
QuestData.RewardText: Falfindel Waywarder sent you? Good! We need your help, now!
